post_message: Bill Brewster: "The Milibands have arrived just in time for Ibiza's season opening parties, but there are plenty of issues on which they could campaign in Ibiza. There are the young workers on zero-hour contracts who flyer the beaches, often working on a basic of €50 per week. Then there’s the scandalous prices of the leading clubs, or the police, often accused of corruption and being heavy-handed. Mind you, after the campaign he’s just had, if I were him, I’d kick back the slingbacks and hit the horse drugs."
